description._content: Repository: California Historical Society Digital object ID: Kemble Spec Col 09_B126 Call Number: Kemble Spec Col 09 Collection: California Lettersheet Collection Date: Undated Physical Description: Lithograph; 19 x 25 cm. General Note: Lith. & Pub. by Britton & Rey. Scope and Contents: Humorous illustration of a drunk miner riding backwards on his horse, with two laughing miners at his left, and text below. Related Collection(s): Forms part of the H.T. Peters Collection. Preferred citation: The jolly old miner, California Lettersheet Collection, Kemble Spec Col 09, courtesy, California Historical Society, Kemble Spec Col 09_B126. Online finding aid: www.oac.cdlib.org/findaid/ark:/13030/c8rx9dfv
